question.body: Which protein does not stay bound to actin?

response.feedback: Correct. Myosin only transiently binds to actin during muscle contraction.
Incorrect. Troponin binds to tropomyosin and actin to regulate actin and myosin interactions.
Incorrect. Tropomyosin binds parallel to actin to stabilize the filaments.
Incorrect. These proteins are all actin-binding proteins, but one of them only binds occasionally.

part.hint: Think about changes during muscle contraction.
